context_bundle.content:
Sidecar pattern for cross-cutting concerns.

Concept:
Deploy helper container alongside main application container.

Use Cases:
- Service mesh proxy (Envoy)
- Log collection (Fluentd)
- Config sync (consul-template)
- SSL termination
- Metrics collection

Benefits:
- Language-agnostic features
- Separate lifecycle
- Reusable across services
- Main app stays simple

Kubernetes:
Pod with multiple containers sharing:
- Network namespace
- Volume mounts
- Lifecycle

Example:
- App container: Port 8080
- Envoy sidecar: Port 15001 (proxy)
- Fluentd sidecar: Reads /var/log
